StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetSMCRReserveUnitBySchoolRowGuid]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@SchoolCode uniqueiden..er, @FiscalYear Integer
AS SET NOCOUNT ON
SELECT
cpsr.[SMCRReserveUnitID], hs.[Organiza.on_ID] AS Organiza.onID, hs.[School_Code] As SchoolCode,cp.[FiscalYear], [ContractType],[SMCRReserveUnitName] As SMCRReserveUnitName, [E1ThruE5Popula.on], sr.[Street1] AS SMCRStreet1, sr.[Street2] AS SMCRStreet2, sr.[City] AS SMCRCity, sr.[State] AS SMCRState, sr.[ZipCode] AS SMCRZipCode,
-- POC Informa.on pc.[PointOfContactID],
RTRIM (pc.POCLastName) AS POCLastName, RTRIM(pc.POCFirstName) AS POCFirstName, POCLegalMiddleName, pc.[Street1], pc.[Street2],pc.[City],pc.[State],pc.[ZipCode], pc.[TelephoneNumber],pc.[CellPhoneNumber],pc.[FaxNumber],pc.[EmailAddress], sr.[Remarks], sr.[NumVisitsPlanned], sr.[ContractGoal] as NumContractGoal
FROM [USMC].[CollegePro.leSMCRReserveUnit] cpsr INNER JOIN [MCRISS].[USMC].[SMCRReserveUnit] sr ON sr.[SMCRReserveUnitID] = cpsr.[SMCRReserveUnitID] INNER JOIN [MCRISS].[USMC].[CollegePro.le] cp ON cpsr.[CollegePro.leID]= cp.[CollegePro.leID] INNER JOIN High_School hs on hs.School_Code = cp.School_Code LEFT OUTER JOIN [MCRISS].[USMC].[PointOfContact] pc ON pc.PointOfContactID = sr.PointOfContactID WHERE hs.rowguid = @SchoolCode AND cp.FiscalYear = @FiscalYear
UNION
SELECT sr.[SMCRReserveUnitID], hs.[Organiza.on_ID] AS Organiza.onID, hs.[School_Code] As SchoolCode,@FiscalYear, [ContractType],[SMCRReserveUnitName] As SMCRReserveUnitName, [E1ThruE5Popula.on], sr.[Street1] AS SMCRStreet1, sr.[Street2] AS SMCRStreet2, sr.[City] AS SMCRCity, sr.[State] AS SMCRState, sr.[ZipCode] AS SMCRZipCode,
-- POC Informa.on pc.[PointOfContactID],
RTRIM (pc.POCLastName) AS POCLastName, RTRIM(pc.POCFirstName) AS POCFirstName, POCLegalMiddleName, pc.[Street1], pc.[Street2],pc.[City],pc.[State],pc.[ZipCode], pc.[TelephoneNumber],pc.[CellPhoneNumber],pc.[FaxNumber],pc.[EmailAddress], sr.[Remarks], sr.[NumVisitsPlanned], sr.[ContractGoal] as NumContractGoal FROM [USMC].[SMCRReserveUnit] sr INNER JOIN High_School hs on hs.[ORGANIZATION_ID] = SR.[ORGANIZATIONID] AND hs.rowguid = @SchoolCode LEFT OUTER JOIN [MCRISS].[USMC].[PointOfContact] pc ON pc.PointOfContactID = sr.PointOfContactID WHERE
sr.[SMCRReserveUnitID] NOT IN ( SELECT sr.[SMCRReserveUnitID] FROM [USMC].[CollegePro.leSMCRReserveUnit] cpsr INNER JOIN [MCRISS].[USMC].[SMCRReserveUnit] sr ON sr.[SMCRReserveUnitID] = cpsr.[SMCRReserveUnitID] INNER JOIN [MCRISS].[USMC].[CollegePro.le] cp ON cpsr.[CollegePro.leID]= cp.[CollegePro.leID] INNER JOIN High_School hs on hs.School_Code = cp.School_Code WHERE hs.rowguid = @SchoolCode AND cp.FiscalYear = @FiscalYear )
--- CLEAN UP SET NOCOUNT OFF
